name: Exhausted Plunge
description:
Attached character takes +1 DMG.
This effect starts off with 3 "Takeoff Countdown Points."
After the character to which this is attached uses a skill: Lose 1 "Takeoff Countdown Point." Once all "Takeoff Countdown Points" are removed, this effect is removed, and the character returns to "Skyward Patrol" status.

Once all "Takeoff Countdown Points" are removed, this effect is removed, and the character returns to "$[C402014]" status.
